ai-ja167:1.1_0: “Mendicant, you seek alms before you eat;
ai-ja167:1.2_0: you wouldn’t seek alms after eating.
ai-ja167:1.4_0: don’t let the time pass you by.
ai-ja167:2.1_0: I don’t know your time to time.
ai-ja167:2.3_0: That’s why I seek alms before eating,
ai-ja167:2.4_0: so that the time may not pass me by!”
ai-ja167:3.1_0: The seventh section on Samiddhi is finished.
